  • Exports

This module implements simulators.

Compile Options:

OptionDescriptionDefault
-d:pon2.path=<str>Path of the web studio./pon2/stable/studio/

Imports

key, nazopuyowrap, ../core, ../private/arrayops2, ../private/assign3, ../private/deques2, ../private/results2, ../private/staticfor2, ../private/strutils2, ../private/tables2, ../private/utils

Types

Simulator = object
Simulator for Puyo Puyo and Nazo Puyo. 
SimulatorEditData = object
  editObj*: SimulatorEditObj
  focusField*: bool
  field*: tuple[row: Row, col: Col]
  step*: tuple[idx: int, pivot: bool, col: Col]
  insert*: bool
Edit information. 
SimulatorEditObj = object
  case kind*: SimulatorEditObjKind
  of EditCell:
    cell*: Cell
  of EditRotate:
    cross*: bool
Edit object. 
SimulatorEditObjKind {.pure.} = enum
  EditCell, EditRotate
Kind of edit objects. 
SimulatorMode {.pure.} = enum
  ViewerPlay = "vp", ViewerEdit = "ve", EditorPlay = "ep", EditorEdit = "ee",
  Replay = "r"
Simulator's mode. 
SimulatorState {.pure.} = enum
  Stable, WillPop, WillSettle, AfterEdit
Simulator's state.

Consts

EditModes = {SimulatorMode.ViewerEdit, SimulatorMode.EditorEdit}
EditorModes = {SimulatorMode.EditorPlay, SimulatorMode.EditorEdit}
PlayModes = {SimulatorMode.ViewerPlay, SimulatorMode.EditorPlay}
Pon2Path {.define: "pon2.path".} = "/pon2/stable/studio/"
ViewerModes = {SimulatorMode.ViewerPlay, SimulatorMode.ViewerEdit}
